entry.def: If something is done under the auspices of a particular person or organization, or under someone's auspices, it is done with their support and approval.

example.ex: ...a walk in support of Forests of the World, under the auspices of the World Wildlife Fund.
example.tran: 由世界自然基金会赞助的支持“保护世界森林”的徒步行走活动

example.ex: ...a peace conference under United Nations auspices.
example.tran: 联合国主办的和平大会

sentences.sentence: "the tournament was held under the auspices of the city council"
